inclusion.criterion: Physically and neurologically healthy [confirmed by a comprehensive medical history]
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: clinically significant medical or neurologic condition or neurocognitive dysfunction
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: that would affect function and/or task performance and/or interfere with the study protocol
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: any current (or within past 2 months) medical condition requiring medication that would interact with dronabinol or interfere with the study protocol
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: risk of harm to self or others that requires immediate intervention
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: presence of contraindications, current or past allergic or adverse reaction, or known sensitivity to cannabinoid-like substances (dronabinol/marijuana/cannabis/THC, cannabinoid oil, sesame oil, gelatin, glycerin, and titanium dioxide)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: positive drug screen or alcohol breathalyzer
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: unwilling/unable to sign informed consent document
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient had a severe 'exploding' headache following a head injury, but was improving with pain medication. She refused PT evaluation and was discharged home.
